TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UrlMapping extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class UrlMapping Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 将显示给用户的 URL 映射到 Web 应用程序中某个页面的 URL。

span.span: Maps a URL that is displayed to users to the URL of a page in your Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过类, 可以将显示给用户的 url 映射到 Web 应用程序中存在的 url。The class allows you to map a URL that is displayed to users to a URL that exists in your Web application. 向添加 `add`对象是以编程方式等效于在配置文件的`urlMappings`节中包含元素。 Adding a object to a is the programmatic equivalent to including an `add` element in the `urlMappings` section of a configuration file. 每个对象都包含两个标识 URL 的属性。Each object contains two properties identifying a URL. 一个属性指定向用户显示的 URL;另一个在 Web 应用程序中指定一个 URL。One property specifies the URL shown to the user; the other specifies a URL in your Web application. 在 和属性中均忽略尾随空白字符。Trailing white-space characters are ignored in both the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 属性可以根据值为的节属性所定义的限制, 将信息写入配置文件的相关部分。 The property can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 在层次结构中不允许在配置文件中写入的任何尝试都会导致分析器生成错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是, 可以使用此类在层次结构中的任何级别上读取配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 web.config 文件的来映射两个 url, 并为其他 url 添加映射。The following example uses the of the Web.config file to map two URLs, and adds a mapping for an additional URL. 修改并保存 web.config 文件时, 应用程序将重新启动。When you modify and save the Web.config file, your application restarts. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/vb/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string url, string mappedUrl) cil managed
Public Sub New (url As String, mappedUrl As String)

span.span: The URL to be displayed to the user.

param.name: mappedUrl
param.span: 您的 Web 应用程序中存在的 URL。

span.span: A URL that exists in your Web application.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数主要供 ASP.NET 内部使用。The constructor is intended primarily for internal use by ASP.NET. 无需从此类派生, 因为它可用于修改 Web.config 文件, 所以您可能永远不需要在代码中使用它。You do not need to derive from this class, and because it can be used to modify the Web.config file, you will probably never need to use it in code. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 web.config 文件的来映射两个 url, 并为其他 url 添加映射。The following example uses the of the Web.config file to map two URLs, and adds a mapping for an additional URL. 修改并保存 web.config 文件时, 应用程序将重新启动。When you modify and save the Web.config file, your application restarts. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/vb/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MappedUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ MappedUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 您的 Web 应用程序中的 URL。

span.span: A URL in your Web application.

value.span: 您的 Web 应用程序中的 URL，该 URL 已映射到由 属性指定的值。

span.span: The URL in your Web application that has been mapped to the value specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是在配置文件`add`的`urlMappings`部分中`mappedUrl`元素的属性的编程等效项。 The property is the programmatic equivalent of the `mappedUrl` attribute of the `add` element in the `urlMappings` section of a configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 当使用 IIS 5.0 时, 如果使用属性从支持的页类型 (如 .aspx 文件) 映射到不受支持的页类型 (如 .asp 页), 则会发生错误。When using IIS 5.0, if you use the property to map from a supported page type (such as an .aspx file) to an unsupported page type (such as an .asp page), an error will occur. IIS 版本6.0 支持这种类型的映射。This type of mapping is supported in IIS version 6.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取属性。The following code example shows how to obtain the property. 此示例摘自类的更大示例。This example is from a larger example for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/cs/default.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.UrlMapping2/vb/default.aspx#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Url As String
public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取显示给用户的 URL。

span.span: Gets the URL that is displayed to the user.
The URL that is displayed to the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是在配置文件`add`的`urlMappings`部分中`Url`元素的属性的编程等效项。 The property is the programmatic equivalent of the `Url` attribute of the `add` element in the `urlMappings` section of a configuration file. ## Examples 有关示例, 请参阅类概述。For an example, see the class overview.
